import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Style/Description.css' import ShoppingCartIcon from '@material-ui/icons/AddShoppingCart'; import FavoriteBorderIcon from '@material-ui/icons/FavoriteBorder'; import axios from './axios' function Description({ src, summary, quantity, price, author, genre, numPages, bookName }) { const [user, setUser] = useState([]); const addFav = () => { axios.post(`/update/clientCart?clientName=${user.clientName}`, { cart: bookName }) console.log(user) } const getClientConnected = () => { axios.get('/get/clientConnected?isConnected=true').then((res) => { setUser(res.data) }) } useEffect (() => { getClientConnected(); }) return (

{bookName} Summary

{summary}

Author

{author}

Genre

{genre}

NÂ° of pages

{numPages}

Price

{price + ' DT'}

Quantity

{quantity}

) } export default Description
